name: grubby-hanky
short_effect: Appears in the Café Warehouse on Sunday; return to the customer with a Patrat on Thursday.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A handkerchief dropped by a regular at Café Warehouse. It smells faintly like a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A handkerchief dropped by a regular at Café Warehouse. It smells faintly like a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A handkerchief dropped by a regular at Café Warehouse. It smells faintly like a Pokémon.
